thread.section_title: Le General Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful town hotel!
thread.title_full: Beautiful town hotel! - Review of Le General Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Linspark
title: Beautiful town hotel!
text: I was here for 2 nights.It is a nice designed hotel with friendly staff and comfortable rooms.It is located near Republic square and it is nice to walk around.Staff was nice with us from the moment we came in hotel and the rooms are very clean.I recommend this hotel to everybody because it is well located,friendly staff,clean,quiet,no need to ask for more.
